title: Wonderful Woodside Home For Rent
posting_body: Newly updated home on a private cul-de-sac in Woodside in the award winning Portola Valley school district!
Vaulted ceilings, decks galore and canyon/redwood views make this home a functional mountain retreat.
The open kitchen has all new appliances and modern granite countertops.
The living room is adjacent to the kitchen and includes a cozy fireplace.
The 3 spacious bedrooms have large closets, one with an attached balcony with views.
There is also a spacious main level office for any "work from home" needs.
A bonus 4th bedroom or 2nd office is located downstairs, with a half bathroom and fireplace included.
The bathrooms have been recently updated, the master bath offering a double vanity.
The 2 car detached garage includes a workbench and plenty of room for storage.
Only 12 minutes to 280, 20 mins to Stanford and 25 mins to the coast.
Come home to your mountain resort in Woodside!
